message: I propose dividing the money with a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This is a fair offer considering the risk of inflation and future rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  I think this is fair given the risks of inflation, and I'm willing to be flexible in future rounds.
I propose an equal division of the remaining funds, as we are now in a position where both parties should benefit equally without taking undue risk.
